detail_desc: Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Satin-covered Alice band with fabric flowers, ears and a padded appliqué in the shape of a shimmering unicorn horn.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Wash bag in a patterned weave with embroidered text, a zip at the top and wrist strap at one side. Lined. Size 20x27 cm.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
V-neck kaftan in patterned satin with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Concealed pockets in the side seams and an asymmetric hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a patterned weave with a small opening and button at the back and frills front and back. Lined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Set with a top and boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey. Top with a racer back and elasticated hem. Briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a collar and drawstring, taped zip down the front, side pockets with taped zips and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Fine-knit joggers in a soft cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round, gathered neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves, smocking a the waist and a softly draping, gathered skirt. Unlined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket and side and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and straight legs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Square-necked top in crinkled jersey with elastication at the shoulders and short puff sleeves with an elasticated, overlocked frill trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a text print front and back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing at the top.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Windbreaker in rustly nylon with metal-coloured panels. Double stand-up collar, one with mesh detailing and a drawstring at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative seams with mesh trims. Raglan sleeves with gathers and elasticated cuffs. Drawstring and elastication at the hem. Mesh lining.
Short dress in an airy weave with an opening at the top and small, pleated stand-up collar with ties at the front. Short, pleated cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative metal chain on the front. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather.
Wide, calf-length skirt in soft fabric with a frill-trimmed, elasticated waist and a seam at the hem with a short fringe trim and wide flounce.

Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a zip down the front with a chin guard and hood with embroidered and padded appliqués and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Appliqués and elastication at the cuffs and elasticated hems. Removable tail fin that is attached with a hook and loop fastener.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.
Short, boxy blouse in viscose crêpe jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist and zip fly and button. Coin pocket and back pockets, all with a flap and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Balaclava knitted in a soft cotton blend with decorative ears on the top. Fleece lining.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in, decorative pleats at the front, back and waist. Concealed zip at the back, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Lined.
Ballet pumps with an adjustable fastening over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Pyjamas with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in sturdy jersey and mesh with a partly transparent top in mesh with lace sections. Long raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Partly lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Knee-length dress in a cotton and viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Scalloped V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam with a lace band at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, drawstring at the waist, single back vent, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Vest tops in organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Bralette in soft, stretch silk and lace with shaped cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and narrow, concealed elastication at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing on the sleeves and hem. Rounded hem.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
KELZUKI x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Off-the-shoulder body in stretch jersey with a sheen. Shaped cups with a bow at the front, dropped shoulders and narrow elastication with a small frill trim around the neckline and sleeves. Press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back.
Fitted top in a ribbed cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.

Fully lined swimsuit with a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover top, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, gathers at the sides for a draped effect and side support.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with glass rhinestones. Two studs, two ear cuffs and one larger earring with a post at the bottom and ear cuff at the top.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Jersey lining.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a print motif, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, mesh-lined side and back pockets, and leg pockets with a concealed zip.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping satin with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized sports top in fast-drying jersey with short cap sleeves. Deep neckline at the back and horizontal straps at the back of the neck. Longer and rounded at the back.

Shimmering halterneck dress in heavily draping chainmail with a draped neckline at the front and low-cut back. Two narrow shoulder straps with sparkly stones that cross at the back, and a raw-edge hem. Satin lining.
Treggings in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with glittery stripes down the sides.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Legs with creases and covered elastication at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Top in cotton jersey with cut-out sections at the shoulders, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Small soft toy in soft velour. Size approx. 14 cm.
